frontmatter.name: swTangencyType_e
frontmatter.description: Tangency options for lofts and profile twist options for sweeps.

title: swTangencyType_e
description: Tangency options for lofts and profile twist options for sweeps.

values.description: = Prevents the profile from becoming self-intersecting as it follows the sweep or loft path; valid only for 3D paths; corresponds to Profile Twist > Minimum Twist in the Sweep PropertyManager

= Makes the adjacent faces tangent at the profile; valid only if swTwistControlType_e is set to swTwistControlFollowPath and only when attaching a sweep or loft to existing geometry; corresponds to Profile Twist > Tangent to Adjacent Faces in the Sweep PropertyManager

= Sets a direction plane, planar face, line, edge, cylinder, axis, or a pair of vertices; valid only if swTwistControlType_e is set to swTwistControlFollowPath; corresponds to Profile Twist > Specify Direction Vector in the Sweep PropertyManager
= Aligns the profile normal to the sweep or loft path; valid only for 2D paths; corresponds to Profile Twist > None in the Sweep PropertyManager
